name: Traffic Motorbike
description:
Traffic Motorbike is high speed motorbike simulator game with 5 different mode. Reach the top of the Skyscraper in TRIAL Mode. Collect gold coins and hit enemy cars. If you like Simulator Games and Motorbike Driving, try it for FREE.

***FEATURES***

* Customizable Rider and Motorbikes
* AAA Physics Engine
* Real World Environments
* Super Motorbikes 10+
* Real Engine Sounds
* Easy Controllers
* Fantastic Suspension
